situation.title: Visits to social facilities
situation.meta_description: Visits in any social service providers' facilities, retirement homes, homes with special arrangements, and any respite care social services in the residential form are prohibited.

content.processed:
Regulation

Visits to any social service providers' facilities, retirement homes, homes with special arrangements, and any respite care, social services in the residential form are prohibited.

The exception to the ban applies to:

  • Underage occupants of social service care
  • Occupants with limited legal capacity
  • Occupants with disabilities occupants whose psychological state or social situation requires it
  • Occupants, in the terminal stage of an incurable illness.
